node.Description: Numbered node observed on this trial

shape.Description: Which shape was shown on this trial

variation.Description: Variation (size, angle) of the displayed shape

correct.Description: Whether the participant responded rorrectly on this trial

is_hamiltonian.Description: If the Modular graph is being used, was this trial part of a Hamiltonian cycle?

movement.Description: Binary representation of the first recorded motor movement. Refers to the buttons, left to right

movement_correct.Description: Binary representation of the required motor movement. Refers to the buttons, left to right
